(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (ADJP
      (ADJP (RB so) (JJ much))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (PDT all) (PRP$ your) (NN support))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (PRP$ my) (VBG upcoming) (NN book)))))
      (. !))))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
advmod(much-3, so-2)
dep(Thanks-1, much-3)
prep(much-3, for-4)
predet(support-7, all-5)
poss(support-7, your-6)
pobj(for-4, support-7)
prep(support-7, for-8)
poss(book-11, my-9)
amod(book-11, upcoming-10)
pobj(for-8, book-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN book))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP
          (ADVP (RB officially))
          (VBN launched)
          (NP (DT this) (NNP Saturday)))))
    (, ,)))


det(book-2, The-1)
nsubjpass(launched-6, book-2)
aux(launched-6, will-3)
auxpass(launched-6, be-4)
advmod(launched-6, officially-5)
root(ROOT-0, launched-6)
det(Saturday-8, this-7)
tmod(launched-6, Saturday-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD 18) (NNS Dec))
      (CC and)
      (NP (PRP I)))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Littered))
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP
                (NP (NNS Books))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (NNP 20) (NNP Duxton) (NNP Road)))))))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB talk)
              (PP (IN about)
                (NP (DT the) (NN book))))))))
    (. .)))


num(Dec-2, 18-1)
nsubj(be-6, Dec-2)
cc(Dec-2, and-3)
conj(Dec-2, I-4)
aux(be-6, will-5)
root(ROOT-0, be-6)
prep(be-6, at-7)
pobj(at-7, Littered-8)
prep(Littered-8, with-9)
pobj(with-9, Books-10)
prep(Books-10, at-11)
nn(Road-14, 20-12)
nn(Road-14, Duxton-13)
pobj(at-11, Road-14)
aux(talk-16, to-15)
xcomp(be-6, talk-16)
prep(talk-16, about-17)
det(book-19, the-18)
pobj(about-17, book-19)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (RB Even) (IN if)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (MD ca) (RB n't)
        (VP (VB attend)
          (NP (DT the) (NN talk))))
      (, ,))))


advmod(attend-6, Even-1)
mark(attend-6, if-2)
nsubj(attend-6, you-3)
aux(attend-6, ca-4)
neg(attend-6, n't-5)
root(ROOT-0, attend-6)
det(talk-8, the-7)
dobj(attend-6, talk-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD can)
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (VP (VB drop)
        (PRT (RP in))
        (PP (IN between)
          (NP (CD 7pm)
            (CC and)
            (CD 9pm)))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB pick)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (NP
                (NP (JJ autographed) (NNS copies))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN book)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(drop-4, you-1)
aux(drop-4, can-2)
advmod(drop-4, still-3)
root(ROOT-0, drop-4)
prt(drop-4, in-5)
prep(drop-4, between-6)
pobj(between-6, 7pm-7)
cc(7pm-7, and-8)
conj(7pm-7, 9pm-9)
aux(pick-11, to-10)
xcomp(drop-4, pick-11)
prt(pick-11, up-12)
amod(copies-14, autographed-13)
dobj(pick-11, copies-14)
prep(copies-14, of-15)
det(book-17, the-16)
pobj(of-15, book-17)


(ROOT
  (SQ (CC But)
    (FRAG
      (ADVP (RB better))
      (SBAR
        (ADVP (RB still))
        (IN if)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB get)
              (S
                (NP (DT the) (NNS tickets))
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB join)
                    (NP (PRP us))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NN wine))
                        (CC and)
                        (NP (NNP Bak) (NNP Kwa))))))))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, But-1)
dep(But-1, better-2)
advmod(get-7, still-3)
mark(get-7, if-4)
nsubj(get-7, you-5)
aux(get-7, can-6)
dep(better-2, get-7)
det(tickets-9, the-8)
nsubj(join-11, tickets-9)
aux(join-11, to-10)
xcomp(get-7, join-11)
dobj(join-11, us-12)
prep(join-11, for-13)
pobj(for-13, wine-14)
cc(wine-14, and-15)
nn(Kwa-17, Bak-16)
conj(wine-14, Kwa-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB register)
        (PP (IN by)
          (S
            (VP (VBG clicking)
              (NP (DT this) (NN link)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(register-3, You-1)
aux(register-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, register-3)
prep(register-3, by-4)
pcomp(by-4, clicking-5)
det(link-7, this-6)
dobj(clicking-5, link-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB See)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (NP (DT this) (NNP Saturday))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, See-1)
nsubj(Saturday-4, you-2)
det(Saturday-4, this-3)
xcomp(See-1, Saturday-4)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP View) (NNP Larger) (NNP Map)))


nn(Map-3, View-1)
nn(Map-3, Larger-2)
root(ROOT-0, Map-3)
